website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy stroller that comes with everything you need.
pros: This stroller has a click-in attachment that works with any KeyFit and Fit2 car seats
Canopy and seat are both detachable
cons: Reports of quality issues over longterm use

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, high-quality construction. I absolutely love this stroller. I describe it as a Honda of the joggin strollers. Simply great quality at a fair price compared to the Bob and Thule Urban Glide. We go on daily walks with our huskys and this stroller is smooth. I removed the seat material so we could use it as a car seat caddy in the first months. The KeyFit 30 car seat clicks in and out very easy. It fits easily in the trunk of my Honda Accord. You will not regret this purchase,
customer_reviews.author: JUAN CARLOS HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this stroller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had done a ton of research on strollers before I purchased this. I have owned a BOB stroller before and decided to give this one a try. It does not disappoint! I absolutely LOVE this thing. It is so easy to push, it’s very sturdy, and handles bumps and gravel like it’s nothing. It is such a smooth ride for my baby. The quality of this is great. It is very easy to collapse and put in the car. Just a button and twist of the handle and boom done. It is quite heavy which I don’t think is a bad thing. To me it just means it’s sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but car seat gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller but our Chicco Keyfit30 carseat keeps getting stuck in it, which is kind of a pain. I did check to make sure the carseat fits this model before purchase and it does, but sometimes it gets stuck in the clips that are supposed to hold it, and we have to pull our baby out of the car seat and then shake the car seat free to get it out. This is a minor inconvenience, but the stroller is really nice I'm willing to let it slide since our son will out grow his car seat before this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: A.Kunetka

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! I live on a ranch and the wheels on this stroller handled it fantastically! The baby was hardly bounced around at all. It was easy to put together and is very easy to manage. I cannot imagine our walks on the gravel roads without this stroller. We put 3 miles on it the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Blair Maranuk

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and Complicated but Good for Runs Only
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice for jogging, as it moves smoothly on the road, where I primarily run. It’s not as good as I thought it would be on dirt and trails. Even with the bump resistant feature it tends to be bumpy. The thing I dislike the most about this product is it’s so difficult to open while holding a baby. It takes 2 hands and a turning motion. It’s also very bulky and doesn’t store well in a car. The padding on the front fell off during a run and I lost it, only after 2 months. Also there isn’t much storage even for a running stroller.
customer_reviews.author: MC Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and can handle faster paced walks/jogs
customer_reviews.text: Stroller works great! Wanted the hand break and hand front wheel lock because I am going to use this with “rollerblading” and hogs/walks. I did have to watch the video about the clicking noises to fix the brake, but after I did that it is now silent. I did add some air to the tires when putting them on as well. We also do have the Chicco car seat that will click into the stroller... if we needed it. Baby loves our multiple walks today and fell asleep in it. Our baby likes to hold on sides of bumper that fits across so another reason we choose this seat is it has that she can use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura ~v~

customer_reviews.title: Great jogging/walking stroller
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for our daughter and her first baby. She loves it, as does the baby. Easy to use and very sturdy. Our daughter ran cross country in highschool and wanted a jogging stroller that would also be used as an everyday stroller. This one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: dlp

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller. Terrible customer service from Chicco.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for bumpy roads and it’s very sturdy. However, from the time we put it together the brakes are terrible. One of them doesn’t latch at all and therefore even when I have the brake on I have to triple check that the one working one has latched. We’ve attempted to email Chicco’s customer service 3 times and have yet to get a response. The stroller is also very large so it isn’t ideal for small cars. It does fit in my Dodge Dart, but just barely. I like that the tires are all removeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Barnett

customer_reviews.title: The stroller itself is great but came with a hole in tire and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller itself is great but came with a hole in tire and the clip for the strap that holds baby in came broken also. They say they cant do anything about it. Must go through manufacturer. Update: had the Stiller for about a year now Manufacturers replace tire and gave me an extra tire free of charge. After about a year the tires are starting to wear down a bit will need to replace tires soon but absolutely love the stroller. We used it with the car seat also, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: William pierce

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller. Ran an off-road 5K with it today
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stroller. Ran an off-road 5K with it today. 9 day-old baby slept through the entire thing. Smooth ride, great handling, superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dallaire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller !! Use it to rollerblade with my one year old originally but now had become my everyday stroller. It’s a little big for some but so easy to maneuver I don’t mind. My one year old loves her stroller and how she can see everything while in it. Only complaint is it needs a tray but I bought a snap on drink and snack cup holder and that works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: CTille

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller, damaged packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller. We love to use it on our gravel road, and this stroller makes the ride pretty smooth. My son loves it. However, I was afraid the stroller was badly damaged when it arrived because is the packaging. The box was ripped with a large hole in it. See pictures. When I pay nearly $400 for something, it better arrive without gaping holes in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Bwf37

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. It’s a little bulky but so worth it. It fits in the back of my civic and easy to close and open. Love all the feature for the our fit family great quality. Remember you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TWO THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.text: I love the TRE. It was easy to assemble. It IS compatible with a Fit2 as well as the key fit and keyfit30, I just had to take the seat out. With the seat, it os recommended for 6mo+. My 5 month old fits, hes 27in and 181/2lbs. But will probably use his car seat for a while. Its super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ColbyC

customer_reviews.title: Great jogger.
customer_reviews.text: Great product (like most anything Chicco). Only headache is that it’s tough to learn to collapse. All the controls are at your hands, no having to move to the front to lock/unlock the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth ride, shocks are great for Bumpy roads or running, glides smoothly. It is a heavy stroller, even though the infant carrier fits this jogger, I would not use as primary stroller since it is very large
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: That front wheel...
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel was awful to try to assemble, everything else went together wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for off roading!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller specifically to be able to navigate through a Tough Mudder obstacle course. The sand was deep, there were gopher holes and mounds of dirt everywhere. This thing was awesome! I was able to jog with it along the course with ease! The baby enjoyed the ride to!
customer_reviews.author: Dlang58

customer_reviews.title: Great build, great materials, but lack in seat space and snack trade not available.
customer_reviews.text: My doughter loves the stroller but the seat its too short, she has her knees bend all the time and also lacks a snack tray. Other than that it has great stirring and great offroad capabilities ill recoment for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J. Lainez

customer_reviews.title: The Best Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Greattttt product. We replaced our stroller when our baby was a week old with this just for walks! Our other stroller very bump shook the baby. This stroller is so smooth!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Chicco TRE
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. My friends 12 year old did it in 5 minutes. It’s easy to fold up and unfold and I love that the car seat pops right in. It’s great for my busy, active lifestyle and my 4 month old loves her outings in it.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Not sure, it was a gift. But I haven't heard anything negative
customer_reviews.author: Wilma W. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about this jogging stroller
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very good stroller the Chicco titan
customer_reviews.text: Chicco titan- I bought this open box and I’m very pleased with the quality. The tires came with air so I didn’t have to pump air out. I love how this stroller came with the cup holder mesh tray thingy. I love the smooth rides. The Thing I don’t like is that is very heavy. The package says 30 pounds if feels like 40-50 pounds. I love the waterproof extended canopy. The break is not like a bicycle but it works wonders when going down on hills. It’s very sturdy. I love it !! It attached to my Chicco fit 30 very well It clicks but there’s a YouTube video on how to fix the clicking sound.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great for jogging, not so much for shopping
customer_reviews.text: It has huge three tires that makes the stroller easy to be maneuvered. Over train rails, bumps, no problem. However, be aware of Small storage. I can’t put my diaper bag in the space. And it’s not easy to fold. It’s great for jogging but not efficient for shopping mall trips.
customer_reviews.author: rei

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Smooth ride! Baby loves it. About to try it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Heskett

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller handles like a champ on any type of terrain. We have a stone driveway and this stroller is super easy to push and provides a smooth ride for our little one. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: So far the stroller is great. All levers and connections work as they are advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rallison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller
customer_reviews.text: What a lifesaver. I was having a hard time with my previous stroller maneuvering on uneven ground or through grass. This one gets through everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is everything I’ve ever wanted in a stroller. Worth every penny I spent. I wish I could’ve discovered this stroller with my first baby. Sadly I found it for my 3 (last) baby.
customer_reviews.author: Irma M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome running stroller.  Very sturdy.  Fits the car seat well too.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome running stroller. Very sturdy. Fits the car seat well too.
customer_reviews.author: printerking

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Super easy to assemble and use. The only I did like about it is that it is still kind of big when folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great anywhere stroller
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Goes smoothly on almost any surface. We do not use it to jog, but for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: A very nice stroller! Easy to use and pushes smoothly. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effortless
customer_reviews.text: You are strollering the wrong way if you’re not using the titan.
customer_reviews.author: jay benoit

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We have taken it on hikes and walks a bunch in the past 2 months. Click in the car seat and go! Love the new black color. The older colors were a little bright. We also love the hand brake, it helps going down hills.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Delia

customer_reviews.title: excellent for running--even for tall parents
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, very smooth ride, excellent for running--even for tall parents!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but soooo nice rolls smooth
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but soooo nice rolls smooth, easy to put together, the extra large canopy is wonderful my daughter has such far skin
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: ... delivered it we put 4 miles on it - love it! Baby loves it too
customer_reviews.text: The day Fedex delivered it we put 4 miles on it - love it! Baby loves it too. Well made and works great for off paved areas, trails but works just as well on paved surfaces. We will use this for years.
customer_reviews.author: DB California

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller looks great and would be perfect for the walking my wife does with the baby but the wheels won't stop squeaking! I have tried everything from greasing them to WD40 and everything you can think of but it won't stop!
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!! Best stroller we have ever had. Pushes smooth and our baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Carseat snaps right in. No need for Adapters! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever! Only thing is it is too big to fit in the back of a regular car without putting the back seat down. Tires are pretty big. Other then that it is easy to handle. Carseat snaps right in which is why I bought it in the first place. So many other strollers you have to buy the adapter but with this one you do not have to at all! So long as it is chicco of course. :) I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: RC

product_meta.title: Chicco TRE Jogging Stroller - Titan
product_meta.description:
The Chicco TRE is designed to keep up with fast-paced families from everyday outings all the way to race day. A lightweight aluminum frame, sleek three-wheel design, deceleration hand brake, and 16" pneumatic rear tires make it easy to maneuver. And dual FlexCore suspension adjusts for smooth or rugged terrain.

For smaller babies, the TRE accepts all KeyFit and Fit2 infant car seats. (car seat sold separately) For added convenience, the stroller seat and backrest detach easily in one piece, along with the canopy, leaving behind a lightweight frame stroller. As baby grows, a five-point harness, multi-position backrest and waterproof fabrics help create a comfortable and secure environment for continued strolling or jogging. A full-coverage canopy with a zippered extension panel and flippable mesh vent/tinted window provides comfortable shade from the sun.

For unmatched convenience, the TRE features an exclusive Control Console with hand-operated functionality that’s easy to access while strolling. The front swivel wheel can be locked/unlocked from the console for on-the-go adjustment. The deceleration brake is also controlled from the console and doubles as a fixed brake for parking. A padded push handle, soft parent tray with two cup holders, and large storage basket provide added convenience.

TRE conveniently folds with one hand into three compact configurations: the standing fold is perfect for the garage; the front swivel wheel easily folds down to create a flat fold for the trunk; and quick-release wheels reduce the footprint for longterm closet storage.

BRAND STORY
By Chicco
feature_bullets: The child seat removes easily to create a frame carrier for the KeyFit during the first 6 months
Sporty fabrics are wipe able, durable and water repellent. Full-coverage, extendable canopy with flippable tinted window/mesh vent
Pneumatic tires, 12" front and 16" rear spoked wheels , Carton Dimensions - 22.7 x 32.13 x 12.78 inches
One-hand fold with three folded configurations: self-standing fold for the garage, flat fold for the trunk and compact fold for storage
Adjustable, Flex Core suspension allows you to choose between a soft ride for bumpy strolling or a more firm ride for jogging
The child seat removes easily to create a frame carrier for the Key Fit during the first 6 months
Sporty fabrics are wipe able, durable and water repellent
Pneumatic tires, 12" front and 16" rear spoked wheels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
